description: This file defines a React functional component 'HelloWorld' using the Remotion library for video composition. It includes schema validation with zod, imports other React components, and implements animations using Remotion hooks such as spring and interpolate. The component arranges animated logo, title, and subtitle sequences within a full-screen layout.

classes.name: HelloWorld
classes.description: A React functional component that renders animated logo, title, and subtitle sequences for a Remotion video composition.

methods.name: HelloWorld
methods.description: React component that displays animated logo, title, and subtitle with motion effects based on video frame counts.
